vocabURI="http://lod.data-archive.ac.uk/skoshasset/c7ef1ece-a170-42e6-80fc-86889073f6e7">USA</keyword>         <topcClas>Economic conditions and indicators - Economics</topcClas>         <topcClas>Economic systems and development - Economics</topcClas>         <topcClas>Income, property and investment - Economics</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>The <i>Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) International Direct Investment Statistics</i> database provides annual statistics from 1980 onwards on international direct investment to and from the OECD area. Data are broken down by geographical zone and industrial sector for direct investment flows and stocks. The data are presented in the following tables: <br> <br> <b>Direct Investment by Country</b><br> Provides statistics for OECD countries on international direct investment flows (inflows, outflows) and position (inward, outward) by geographical distribution, i.e. to and from partner countries and regions. Data are provided in national currency.<br> <br> <b>Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) - by Industrial Sectors</b><br> Provides statistics for OECD countries on international direct investment flow (inflows, outflows) and positions (inward, outward) by industrial sector, according to the International Standard Industrial Classification Revision 3 secondary level classification.<br> <br> <b>Exchange Rates</b><br> Provides statistics for OECD countries on exchange rates both as yearly averages and end-of-period rates in national currency units per United States dollar (USD). Note: These OECD series relate to exchange rates used at the time of drafting to compute the amounts in US dollars for comparative tables. Data are provided in national currency per US dollar.<br> <br> <b>Summary Tables</b><br> This table provides cross-country comparisons of international direct investment flows (inflows, outflows) and positions (outward, inward). Data are provided in millions of US dollars.<br> <br> These data were first provided by the UK Data Service in May 2004. The UK Data Service web site includes further information on its <i>OECD International Direct Investment Statistics</i> holdings, including a <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk//use-data/guides/dataset/international-investment.aspx" title="OECD International Direct Investment Statistics dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a> and details of <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/idis/2010" title="OECD International Direct Investment Statistics latest database updates">latest database updates</a>.<br> <br> <b>Citation:</b> The bibliographic citation for the database is: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development ({YYYY}): International Direct Investment Statistics ({Ed. Data download: YYYY-MM}). Mimas, University of Manchester. DOI: {edition specific doi - e.g. <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/idis/2010">http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/idis/2010</a>). <br> <br> Alternative DOIs: <a href="http://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/finance-and-investment/data/oecd-international-direct-investment-statistics_idi-data-en" title"10.1787/idi-data-en">10.1787/idi-data-en</a> (to access via OECD.Stat subscription).<br> <br> </abstract>       <abstract><B>Main Topics</B>:<br>The database covers the following topics:<br> <ul><li>economic indicators</li><li>foreign investment</li><li>international monetary systems</li><li>exchange rates</li><li>finance</li><li>monetary economics</li><li>foreign capital</li><li>investment</li></ul></abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd>The <i>OECD International Direct Investment Statistics</i> run from 1980 onwards</timePrd>         <nation>Multi-nation</nation>         <geogUnit>Countries</geogUnit>         <anlyUnit>Administrative units (geographical/political)</anlyUnit>         <universe>Cross-national; National</universe>         <universe>The following countries are covered in the database: <br>Australia, Austria, Belgium-Luxembourg Economic Union, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Korea, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, United Kingdom and United States.</universe>         <dataKind>Numeric data</dataKind>         <dataKind> Aggregate (macro) level</dataKind>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Time Series</timeMeth>         <timeMeth>updated annually</timeMeth>         <sampProc>See documentation for details</sampProc>         <collMode>For details of methodology, please see the <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk//use-data/guides/dataset/international-investment.aspx" title="OECD International Direct Investment Statistics dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a>.</collMode>         <sources />         <weight>Weighting used.
